## Computed diagnostics (compact, scrollable)

<style>
  .diag-wrap { max-height: 65vh; overflow:auto; padding-right:.5rem; }
  .row { margin: .4rem 0; }
  .probe { display:inline-block; min-width: 18rem; }
  .computed { color:#666; font-size:.8em; display:inline-block; margin-left:.5rem; }
</style>

<div class="diag-wrap">

<div class="row"><span class="probe es" style="font-weight:300">EHUSans — 300</span><span class="computed"></span></div>
<div class="row"><span class="probe es" style="font-weight:400">EHUSans — 400</span><span class="computed"></span></div>
<div class="row"><span class="probe es" style="font-weight:400; font-style:italic">EHUSans — 400 italic</span><span class="computed"></span></div>
<div class="row"><span class="probe es" style="font-weight:700">EHUSans — 700</span><span class="computed"></span></div>
<div class="row"><span class="probe es" style="font-weight:700; font-style:italic">EHUSans — 700 italic</span><span class="computed"></span></div>
<div class="row"><span class="probe es" style="font-weight:900">EHUSans — 900</span><span class="computed"></span></div>

<div class="row"><span class="probe eu" style="font-weight:300">EHUSerif — 300</span><span class="computed"></span></div>
<div class="row"><span class="probe eu" style="font-weight:400">EHUSerif — 400</span><span class="computed"></span></div>
<div class="row"><span class="probe eu" style="font-weight:400; font-style:italic">EHUSerif — 400 italic</span><span class="computed"></span></div>
<div class="row"><span class="probe eu" style="font-weight:700">EHUSerif — 700</span><span class="computed"></span></div>
<div class="row"><span class="probe eu" style="font-weight:700; font-style:italic">EHUSerif — 700 italic</span><span class="computed"></span></div>
<div class="row"><span class="probe eu" style="font-weight:900">EHUSerif — 900</span><span class="computed"></span></div>

</div>

```{=html}
<script>
(function(){
  const rows = document.querySelectorAll('.row');
  rows.forEach(r => {
    const probe = r.querySelector('.probe');
    const cs = getComputedStyle(probe);
    const out = r.querySelector('.computed');
    out.textContent = `family: ${cs.fontFamily}; weight: ${cs.fontWeight}; style: ${cs.fontStyle}`;
  });
})();
</script>
```
